subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Matteo Manassero, an Italian who will turn 18 on Tuesday, won the Malaysian Open on Sunday in Kuala Lumpur to capture his second European Tour title and upstage a remarkable recovery by Rory McIlroy, 21, of Northern Ireland.
snippet: Matteo Manassero, an Italian who will turn 18 on Tuesday, won the Malaysian Open on Sunday in Kuala Lumpur to capture his second European Tour title and upstage a remarkable recovery by Rory McIlroy, 21, of Northern Ireland.
